summary: This bill, the Navajo-Gallup Water Supply Project Amendments Act of 2025, amends the Northwestern New Mexico Rural Water Projects Act. It redefines terms, authorizes the expansion of the project's service area to include additional Navajo Nation communities in New Mexico and Arizona, and addresses funding and land-related matters. It establishes a Deferred Construction Fund, modifies appropriation amounts, and clarifies taxation related to the project. It also addresses the use of non-Project water for Utah, as part of the Navajo-Utah Settlement Agreement.
